sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Projects() { return (
  • COVID-19 Heatmap A lot of data is currently being produced on the pandemic on a global scale. A user-friendly interactive heatmap which allows the users to query and retrieve data about the country of their choice. The service allows users to register and login to the service before they are able to perform any queries using the service. The data source is updated every 24HRs to ensure relevent and up to date data.

  • COVID-19 CLI This is a user-friendly interactive CLI version of the COVID-19 heatmap app, which allows users to to query and retrieve data about the country of their choice. You can download the python script and run it on your device from the provided link. The data source is updated every 24HRs to ensure relevent and up to date data.

  • Poised Program calculates the costs of a building project for a customer and tracks those involved till completion.

  • Task_manager The program helps progress tracking by means of managing tasks and users of an organisation.

  • Game Game that lets the user navigate a helicopter to dodge missiles to win the game.

  • Financial_Calculator Program gives user access to two different financial calculators. 'Investment' and 'Home loan repayment' calculator.
  • Poised Engineering This program is the same as the previously mentioned 'Poised' project but instead of only keeping data for the duration of runtime. This program stores the data in a MySQL database for later access, with the edition of Structural Engineers, Project Managers.
  • Book Store The Book store program allows the user to enter, update, delete, search and view all the books in the ebookstore database using the JDBC to run the different operations.
  • String Calculator The user will enter an expression in string format and the output/result will be in string format. The operator prefix the operands in the expressions.
); } export default Projects;
